Don't forget the relief
when you solved the urgent issue. üòå

Always leave the place beautiful,
Cleaning up is essential!

A toilet known only to me
can be a savior for someone else. ‚ú®

Find open toilets around you
directly on the map.

Reviews are communication.

Points used to view toilet info
or unlock passwords in the app.

Register known open toilets
and save everyone's urgency! ü¶∏

reg_step_3_desc: Leave a photo of the entrance or tips if any.

submit_location_land_only:

(Coastal/island areas may have errors)

submit_placeholder_note: Ex: Often no tissue, stiff lock...

tos_article_1_content: The purpose of these Terms is to define the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the service and the user regarding the use of the toilet information sharing service provided by Daettong Unity (hereinafter referred to as the 'Service'), and other necessary matters.
tos_article_2_li_1: 'Service' means the toilet location information sharing and search platform provided by Daettong Unity.
tos_article_2_li_2: 'User' means members and non-members who use the Service in accordance with these Terms.
tos_article_2_li_3: 'Member' means a person who has registered for the Service by providing personal information.
tos_article_2_li_4: 'Toilet Information' means all information related to toilets, such as location, availability, and facility details.
tos_article_2_li_5: 'Credit' means virtual points obtained within the Service through activities such as registering toilet information or writing reviews.
tos_article_3_sub_1_content: These Terms are effective for all users who wish to use the Service.
tos_article_3_sub_2_content: The Service may change these Terms to the extent that they do not violate relevant laws. In such cases, the changed Terms will be announced on the Service screen and will take effect 7 days after the announcement.
tos_article_4_sub_1_li_1: Toilet location search and map display
tos_article_4_sub_1_li_3: Writing and viewing toilet usage reviews
tos_article_4_sub_1_li_6: Other services developed or provided by the Service
tos_article_4_sub_2_content: The Service is provided 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. However, the Service may be temporarily suspended due to system maintenance, communication failure, etc., in which case it will be announced in advance.
tos_article_5_sub_1_content: Users can sign up through social logins such as Google, Naver, and Kakao.
tos_article_5_sub_2_content: Members must provide accurate information, and any disadvantage caused by providing false information is the responsibility of the member.
tos_article_5_sub_3_content: Children under the age of 14 are restricted from signing up in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act.
tos_article_6_content: The Service strives to protect user's personal information in accordance with relevant laws. The privacy policy of the Service and relevant laws apply to the protection and use of personal information.
tos_article_7_sub_1_content: Users must not perform the following acts:
tos_article_7_sub_1_li_2: Registering false information or deceiving others
tos_article_7_sub_1_li_3: Interfering with the operation of the Service
tos_article_7_sub_1_li_4: Posting obscene or violent messages, images, voices, etc.
tos_article_7_sub_1_li_5: Damaging the reputation of others or causing disadvantage
tos_article_7_sub_1_li_6: Infringing on the rights of others, such as copyright
tos_article_7_sub_2_content: Members are responsible for managing their accounts properly and cannot transfer or lend their accounts to others.
tos_article_8_sub_1_content: Members can earn credits through the following activities:
tos_article_8_sub_1_li_2: Register Toilet Info: Differential payment according to policy
tos_article_8_sub_1_li_3: Write Review: Payment according to policy
tos_article_8_sub_1_li_4: Watch Ads: Payment according to policy
tos_article_8_sub_2_content: Credits can be used for functions within the Service, such as checking password-protected toilet information.
tos_article_8_sub_3_content: Credits are not refundable in cash and can only be used within the Service.
tos_article_9_sub_1_content: The user who registered the content, such as toilet information and reviews, is responsible for the content.
tos_article_9_sub_2_content: The Service may delete or move content without prior notice in the following cases:
tos_article_9_sub_2_li_2: Infringement of the rights of others
tos_article_9_sub_2_li_4: Violation of public order and morals
tos_article_10_content: If a user violates these Terms or interferes with the normal operation of the Service, the Service may take measures such as warning, suspension, or permanent ban.
tos_article_11_sub_1_content: The Service is exempted from liability if it cannot provide the Service due to force majeure such as natural disasters, war, suspension of service by telecommunications business operators, hacking, or system maintenance.
tos_article_11_sub_2_content: The Service does not guarantee the accuracy of toilet information registered by users and is not responsible for any damages caused by the use of such information.
tos_article_11_sub_3_content: The Service is not responsible for disputes arising between users or between users and third parties.
tos_article_12_content: Copyright for content provided by the Service belongs to the Service. Users must not use information obtained by using the Service for commercial purposes or allow third parties to use it without the prior consent of the Service.
tos_article_13_sub_1_content: The laws of the Republic of Korea apply to the interpretation of these Terms and disputes regarding the use of the Service.
tos_article_13_sub_2_content: In the event of a lawsuit regarding a dispute arising from the use of the Service, the competent court under the Civil Procedure Act shall be the court of competent jurisdiction.
tos_article_14_content: These Terms are effective from December 6, 2024.
privacy_intro: Daettong Unity (hereinafter referred to as the 'Service') values users' personal information and complies with relevant laws such as the 'Personal Information Protection Act'. This Privacy Policy guides you through the items of personal information collected, purpose of collection and use, retention and use period, and destruction procedures.
privacy_sec_1_req_li_1: Email Address: Member identification and service provision
privacy_sec_1_req_li_2: Gender: Provision of customized toilet information
privacy_sec_2_li_1: Member Sign Up & Management: Identification, verification
privacy_sec_2_li_2: Service Provision: Toilet location, customized content
privacy_sec_2_li_3: Service Improvement: Usage statistics, new service development
privacy_sec_3_content: The Service destroys user's personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use is achieved.
privacy_sec_3_box_exception: Exception: If preservation is required by relevant laws
privacy_sec_4_content: The Service destroys personal information without delay when the retention period expires or the purpose of processing is achieved.
privacy_sec_4_li_2: Method: Permanent deletion of electronic files
privacy_sec_5_content: The Service does not provide user's personal information to third parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:
privacy_sec_5_li_1: With prior consent from the user
privacy_sec_5_li_2: In accordance with legal regulations or investigative requests
privacy_sec_6_content: The Service uses the following social login services:
privacy_sec_6_footer: Please refer to the privacy policy of each service provider for details.
privacy_sec_7_content: Users can exercise the following rights at any time:
privacy_sec_7_li_1: Request for access to personal information
privacy_sec_7_box: How to Exercise: 'My Info' menu or email to Privacy Officer
privacy_sec_8_content: The Service designates a Privacy Protection Officer to be responsible for handling personal information and complaints.
privacy_sec_9_content: Amendments to this policy will be notified through Service announcements at least 7 days prior to implementation.
privacy_footer_date: This Privacy Policy is effective from December 6, 2025.
privacy_footer_contact: If you have any questions, please contact
